note: Finding 10-15 candidates matching ALL criteria (recent grad 2023-2025, specific design schools, SVG animation focus, AI/creative coding passion, Twitter active, immediately available) proved very challenging. Many talented motion designers found were either experienced professionals or lacked clear graduation dates/immediate availability. Below are the best verified candidates with real profiles.

candidates.name: Helen Niu
candidates.channelSource: LinkedIn - Parsons Communication Design Recent Graduates
candidates.bio: Motion and interaction designer, graduated from Parsons School of Design with BFA in Communication Design (2022). Worked as Motion Design Intern at Dome Collective on immersive exhibits. Based in Brooklyn, interested in bold design storytelling.
candidates.matchReason: Parsons Communication Design graduate with motion design experience, has professional portfolio. However, graduated in 2022 (slightly outside 2023-2025 window) and unclear about immediate freelance availability or AI/creative coding interest.

candidates.name: Eason Li
candidates.bio: VFX Compositor and Filmmaker at SVA. Won 2025 Best in Show for Visual Effects at SVA BFA 3D Animation. Creates motion graphics using After Effects, skilled in rotoscoping, tracking, matte painting, CGI compositing.
candidates.matchReason: Perfect graduation timing (Class of 2025), SVA graduate with award-winning motion graphics work, has GitHub and portfolio. Strong technical skills. Needs verification on immediate availability and AI/creative coding passion.

candidates.name: Abigail Michals
candidates.channelSource: LinkedIn - Parsons Communication Design Recent Graduates
candidates.bio: Parsons BFA Communication Design Class of 2025, specializes in Animation, Digital Product Design, and UX. Created 'Palette', an interactive educational website with engaging animations for children ages 6-10.
candidates.matchReason: Perfect fit for graduation year (2025) and school (Parsons). Animation focus with UX/digital product design skills. Portfolio shows interactive work. Needs verification on SVG animation expertise, immediate availability, and creative coding community involvement.

candidates.name: Aiden Domenz
candidates.channelSource: Instagram - SVA Motion Graphics Program (via SCAD network)
candidates.bio: SCAD BFA Motion Graphics recent graduate, passionate about drawing and animation. Works with Adobe Illustrator, After Effects, Procreate, TouchDesigner, and Blender. Created projection mapping animations in Lacoste, France.
candidates.matchReason: Recent SCAD graduate (2024) with strong motion graphics portfolio. Uses creative tools including TouchDesigner (creative coding adjacent). However, not from the specified schools (Parsons/SVA/FIDM) and unclear on immediate freelance availability.

candidates.name: Tanaya Khadke
candidates.channelSource: Instagram - SVA Motion Graphics Program (via SCAD network)
candidates.bio: Freelance motion designer and illustrator in Brooklyn, specializes in 2D animation, illustrations, and advertising. SCAD graduate mentor. Works with major clients including Meta, Netflix, LG, HP-AI. Explores generative art and AR/VR.
candidates.matchReason: Strong freelance motion designer with impressive portfolio and client list. Active in creative technologies including generative art. However, appears to be experienced professional rather than recent graduate, and not from specified schools.

candidates.name: Ryosuke Hana (whoisryosuke)
candidates.channelSource: Personal Blog - Creative Coders with P5.js/Motion Focus
candidates.bio: Sr. Design Technologist at PlayStation prototyping new experiences. Active blogger about p5.js, Motion animation, and creative coding. Created video renderers for P5.js with Motion. Works with ReactJS, TypeScript, Rust, Python.
candidates.matchReason: Excellent creative coding and p5.js expertise with active blog and community presence. Strong technical portfolio. However, senior professional at PlayStation, not a recent graduate, and not available for freelance/gig work.

candidates.name: Gideon1107 (GitHub username)
candidates.bio: Developer who built Portfolio-Website-2025 using React, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion. Portfolio features smooth animations, interactive particle background, scroll-to-top functionality, fully responsive design. Deployed on Vercel.
candidates.matchReason: Strong technical skills with Framer Motion and modern web animation. Active GitHub. However, only username available (no real name), no verified graduation year, location unknown, and primarily appears to be a developer rather than motion designer.

candidates.name: Jonathan Trancozo (littus)
candidates.bio: IT Analyst and front-end developer since 2012, creates SVG animations with CSS3. Known for CodePen projects including Coffee Machine and Project Deadline SVG animations. Develops responsive web interfaces.
candidates.matchReason: Strong SVG animation expertise with impressive CodePen portfolio. Active developer with GitHub presence. However, based in Brazil (not USA/Canada), experienced professional rather than recent grad, and not from specified design schools.

searchChallenges: Most motion designers with strong SVG animation portfolios are experienced professionals, not recent graduates
Difficult to verify graduation years (2023-2025 specifically) from web searches alone
Many talented designers found are international (not USA/Canada based)
Few publicly indicate immediate freelance availability or engagement with AI/creative coding communities on Twitter
FIDM graduates were particularly hard to find with motion design portfolios
GitHub/CodePen users often use handles without real names or graduation information
Many strong candidates from schools like SCAD and Ringling (not on the specified school list)
recommendations: Visit the Parsons 2025 BFA Communication Design showcase (bfacd.parsons.edu) directly to browse motion graphics students and contact them individually
Check SVA Design motion graphics portfolio site (sva.design/motion/) for recent graduates with contact information
Attend or review recordings from design school thesis shows (SVA May 2025, Parsons Design & Technology Thesis)
Post on design school job boards or alumni networks for immediate freelance opportunities
Search Twitter/X directly for hashtags like #motiondesign #creativecoding #SVGanimation combined with #classof2025
Consider expanding criteria to include talented candidates from SCAD, Ringling, or international design schools
Reach out directly to candidates like Eason Li, Abigail Michals, and Aiden Domenz who are verifiable recent graduates
